data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Osun.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Osun, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,065,945 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Osun, Nigeria.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, make the church in Osun, Nigeria humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Osun that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Koro Nulu people. 1.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord we pray you unite the 1,065,945 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Osun.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Osun, Nigeria find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Osun, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Osun
location.cities_list: Ilesa, Iwo, Ikire, Ila Orangun, Inisa
